definition: snow/snowfall/CL:場|场[chang2]/to have the appearance of snow/to wipe away, off or out/to clean

sentences.english: Store perishable food in refrigerator. Keep it well covered.
sentences.chinese: 容易變壞的食物應蓋好存放於雪櫃中。

sentences.english: Chill in the refrigerator until set.
Fill the savarin moulds with yogurt mixture. Keep in refrigerator for at least 4 ours or until the mixture is set.
sentences.chinese: 將乳酪凍倒入模內，放雪櫃內最少4小時待完全凝固。

sentences.english: Freeze the pork belly in the refrigerator.
sentences.chinese: 把煮好的五花腩放在雪櫃冷凍。

sentences.english: Transfer chicken paste into a container, chill until set.
sentences.chinese: 將雞肝醬倒入器皿中，置雪櫃冷藏至凝固。

sentences.english: Fill the savarin moulds with the yogurt mixture. Keep in refrigerator for at least 4 hours or until the mixture is set.
sentences.chinese: 將乳酪凍倒入模內，放雪櫃內最少4小時待完全凝固。

sentences.english: Refrigerate the roll for at least an hour to make sure the beef log will hold its shape.
sentences.chinese: 將牛柳卷放進雪櫃冷藏最少1小時，才能固定形狀。

sentences.english: Add corn flour and salt to beaten egg and stir well. Refrigerate the egg mixture for 10 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 蛋汁加入生粉及鹽，攪勻後放入雪櫃冷藏約10分鐘。

sentences.english: Marinate with seasoning in zip-lock bags, and leave overnight in refrigerator.
sentences.chinese: 塗上醃料，以密實袋裝好，放在雪櫃醃過夜。

sentences.english: Fridges of young middle-class couples may be filled with ice cream and other things sweet.
sentences.chinese: 一對年輕中產夫婦的雪櫃裏，差不多盡是雪糕和甜點。

sentences.english: However, they have already possessed television sets and refrigerators.
sentences.chinese: 然而，他們已擁有電視和雪櫃。

sentences.english: This is how your fridge looks like of three-family members?
sentences.chinese: 這是你心目中之三人家庭的雪櫃嗎？

definition: to dismantle/to disassemble/to open up (sth sealed)/to unpick
